member.name: M:CMS.DocumentWebServices.DocumentRESTService.GetDocument(System.String)
member.summary: Selects tree node(s) according to provided parameters and returns them as dataset. Three oprations are supported: document (= select single document), all (= select documents), childrenof (= all children of given node). If classNames not specified, the result does not contain coupled data.
